name: Seaside Bellona
description: Ace of the Phantom CIC, brighter than the sun
story: Bellona has come to Reingar to help Karin and the Public Security Club cope with the influx of summer visitors. Although she claims she's here to watch over Sez, it seems her true goal is to relax in the resort.
get_line: Sometimes it's important to get some rest. Only then can you be at the top of your game.

relations.description: Although Sez still has a long way to go, Bellona is glad to see him getting along with others.
A cute dancer. She seems to be enjoying the bustling energy of the resort.
Bellona respects Karin for her efforts to uphold justice as a member of Reingar PSC.

specialty.name: Keep Your Distance
specialty.description: She won't tolerate anyone who disturbs her relaxing vacation.

skills.name: I'm with My Friends
skills.description:
Shares 30% of damage suffered by the caster with the foremost ally. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The caster gains 1 Focus when an ally is attacked. When an ally is attacked and the caster's stacked Focus is 5, loses all Focus and activates You're Not Cute.
You're Not Cute: Attacks all enemies with a fan, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

debuffs.name: Target
debuffs.effect: Increases damage received by the target by 15%, while decreasing Evasion by 15%.

debuffs.name: Cannot Buff
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be buffed.

debuffs.name: Unhealable
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be healed.

skill1.name: 気をつけなさい!
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、60.0%の確率で標的を1ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 友人と一緒に来ました
skill2.desc:
自身が受けるダメージの30%を前衛の味方が代わりに受ける。ダメージ分配効果が重複した場合、最も高い効果のみ適用される。
味方が攻撃を受けた時に【集中】を1獲得し、【集中】が5の場合、【集中】をすべて消費して【あなたに魅力なんてないわ】を発動する。
あなたに魅力なんてないわ : 敵全体に攻撃し、50%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: わたくし、警告しましたよ?
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、85.0%の確率で強化不可・回復不可を2ターンの間付与する。クリティカル発生時、ダメージがUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 敵全体に攻撃し、85.0%の確率で強化不可・回復不可を2ターンの間付与する。クリティカル発生時、ダメージがUPする。
